data.description: About Cluely Cluely is building AI to give you an unfair advantage in every situation. It acts as a desktop assistant that takes in screen, mic, and audio context to give you information and suggestions that existing model providers cannot, due to a lack of context. We will win for two reasons: 1) Chatbots are not the best interface for multi-modal AI 2) We can make anything viral About the Role We work six days a week in-person in San Francisco, 10-12 hours a day. You are expected to live within a block of the office (housing provided). Our eng team is a mix of staff-level SWEs and tuff 19 yr olds, check it out here . You might be a good fit if you are: One of the best engineers in the world Down to gamble your life into greatness Compensation: Founding engineers get anywhere from $250-350k base + 0.25-0.5% equity We also offer free housing, free food, and free transportation.
